A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film just left me cold. I'm almost speechless. The only words I can find to describe this movie are \"ridiculous\"\, \"ludicrous\"\, \"inane\". The sole saving grace is that this isn't really a Star Wars movie at all - it's a Marvel one.\nObviously it appears many disagree and enjoyed the film; they say this is a different Star Wars now; it is *their* Star Wars. All I can say to that is I'm pleased for you and you're welcome to it! *My* Star Wars was the OT\, (though I enjoyed Rogue One and TFA too) and I definitely know who got the better end of that deal :-)\nLast thoughts - Mark Hamill was wonderful - he deserved so much better than this.
